Event.name: Change_of_quantity_of_possession
Event.definition: <def-root>This frame describes a general situation in which an <fen>Owner</fen> either increases or decreases their amount of a <fen>Possession</fen>. The increase or decrease may either be physical or metaphorical. <ex><fex name="Owner">The plant</fex> <t>lost</t> <fex name="Possession">water</fex> <fex name="Explanation">as the the temperature increased</fex>.</ex> <ex><t>Gaining</t> <fex name="Possession">leadership experience</fex> is one of the benefits of being a camp counselor. <fex name="Owner">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Owner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Owner</fen> is the entity that contains within itself or controls the <fen>Possession</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Possession
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Possession</fen> is the physical or metaphoric object that increases or decreases in quantity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Possession</fen> undergoes a change in quantity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Possession</fen> undergoes a change in quantity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes a proposition from which the event of increasing or decreasing in quantity logically follows.</def-root>
